entries.title: Covid misinfo spikes in wake of Damar Hamlin’s on-field collapse
entries.description: It only a took a few hours for misinformation about covid vaccines to sweep social media after Damar Hamlin collapsed on the field.

entries.title: Twitter reverses longstanding ban on political advertising
entries.description: The company said Tuesday that it was relaxing its ban on political and issue-based advertising, a reversal of its longstanding approach to paid political speech.

entries.title: Microsoft gets its first gaming union, largest in North America
entries.description: Quality assurance testers at Microsoft-owned ZeniMax won their union vote, becoming Microsoft's first union and the largest video game union in North America.

entries.title: 2023 tech innovations probably won’t change your life
entries.description: Here's the best tech resolution for 2023: Stop listening to predictions about how technology will change your life. No one knows anything.

entries.title: The tech trends to watch for in 2023
entries.description: More metaverse hype. Shifts in streaming media. Maybe even more robots. These are the tech trends you may celebrate -- or stomach -- in 2023.
